response.overview: France has always had a certain reputation for sexual action, so it's perhaps not surprising that the folks at Twink Heritage have teamed together to discover this wonderful Gallic montage of hardcore action; featuring some of the hottest beauts around, including Tom Evans, Toby Steiner and Eric Chateau. All of whom have a distinct taste for al fresco action; as they take advantage of the stunning scenery to engage in the sort of wanton, ball-busting adventures that wet dreams are made of. In the woods, by the pool...these fellows don't seem to care, so long as their cocks are being tugged and their asses are being fucked. All of which culminates in a blizzard of sticky love-juice, to leave each one of them soaked to the skin in this French Summer Love.
response.title: French Summer Love
